title: Cant join a game
body: https://imgur.com/sdQmiwK This is the message that it shows, my friend list is bugged too. Just yesterday i had to redowload the client because it didnt open, for no reasosns. And today this happens.

replies.body: EUW/EUN are having issues right now. Folks have been paged and are actively working on investigating and resolving the issues.

Please post this on the EUW board perhaps aswell....................... 
No one hears from rito there.

Still nothing from rito on euw forum, nice :D
as far as i know
no wonder we in Europe feels like we are expendable

> [{quoted}](name=Riot BlueMonday,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=oBdwXLXk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2020-02-20T21:13:02.422+0000)
>
> EUW/EUN are having issues right now. Folks have been paged and are actively working on investigating and resolving the issues.

Thanks for the fast answer, i appreciate that at least.
I can't even see my friendlist anymore.
Same and I am on the NA server
this is just awesome for a Friday night, tnx Riot!

https://i.imgur.com/yVl0mAH.png
tried opening the game and i'm getting 20k in queue lmao

dont worry, i got kicked out and also wait in the limbo to join the server again xD

Edit: okey the timer changed from 12 minutes to 11 and now to 24 xD
looks like singed has thrown me further back in the waiting line.
